section.title: Configuring a Database for CloudForms Management Engine
section.para: Before using CloudForms Management Engine, configure the database options for it. CloudForms Management Engine provides two options for database configuration:

listitem.para: Install an Internal PostgreSQL database to the appliance
Configure the appliance to use an External PostgreSQL database

note.title: Note
note.para: See "CPU Sizing Assistant for a Dedicated VMDB Host" in the Deployment Planning Guide for guidelines on CPU requirements.
